item.description:
TC: Gary Schwartz, mosaictrip4@averagebear.us (preferred) or 781 752 5273

EVENT: We'll spend the day in Rockport, MA. First we'll walk through Halibut Point State Park, with the old rock quarries that give Rockport its name. We will have a BYO picnic lunch there. Then we'll head over to Bearskin Neck to see the scenery, the port, Motif #1, touristy and artsy shops and other interesting things including strudel. Bring a sandwich or bag lunch and water bottle. Dress for possible sea breezes.
RSVP: REQUIRED by September 27
MEET: 10:00 AM. Contact TC for directions to meeting place.
COST: $5 for Non-members

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Rockport Walk
